skins.shipDescription: Mogami-class heavy cruiser number four 每 Kumano.
skins.selfIntroduction: Name's Kumano, Mogami-class heavy cruiser! Back in the war, I was Cruiser Division 7, workin' my ass off! Shame about what happened at the island in you-know-where, though... Welp, no point crying over spilt milk. Just gotta do better this time.
skins.acquisition: Bam! Heavy cruiser, Kumano, ready for action~! Commander, pleased to meetcha~!
skins.login: There you are, Commander! Nice, nice! So, what's up today? We hangin' out together? Just work? Figures...
skins.details: Yo, Commander! Hang out with me, now! Oh, is that a lollipop for me? 'Kay, some other time then! Nom!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Huh? Me takin' the battle seriously surprised you? Well, yeah, I get serious when the situation demands it.
skins.secretaryIdle2: So, Commander, what kinda girls do ya like? Wait, lemme guess, I'm your type, aren't I? Ahah!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Soooo bored... Hey, could ya get Suzuya up in this place? I wanna chat with her about my next shopping trip.
skins.secretaryTouch: Well, well! Caught you admirin', Commander! Hehehe, you don't gotta act innocent. If you wanna stare, stare all ya want!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Weeeell, someone's feeling frisky, huh? Totes fine with me. Go on, touch me 'till you're content~?

skins.shipDescription: It's time for Kumano's sexy swimsuit debut~! Just kidding~∵ Hey Commander, just where~ are~ you~ staring~? Ahaha~?
skins.acquisition: It's time for Kumano's sexy swimsuit debut~! Just kidding~∵ Hey Commander, just where~ are~ you~ staring~? Ahaha~?
skins.details: This is too revealing? Meh, not really~? I've seen submarines wearing more risqu谷 stuff than this.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commandeeeer, what're you up to? Get over here already, c'mooon!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I wanna see Mogami in a bikini! Don't you? I do, at least! And you? Same, right?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Phew, I'm tired! Commandeeeer, massage my feet and shoulders! ...Err, I didn't ask you to massage THOSE!
skins.secretaryTouch: Candy? Nuh-uh, this is mine, and I ain't givin' it away! Hahahah!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hah, I knew this would catch your eye! You're like a little kid~
